metadata.title: NDT-CLBP Indicator Weights Update
metadata.description: Risk-weight and decision-threshold layer for PT-CHARLIE chronic low back pain triage.
metadata.source: NDT-CLBP 47 indicators + KNGF low back pain guideline alignment

decision_logic.rule_1: Any confirmed red flag (I28/I29) triggers immediate handoff.
decision_logic.rule_2: If psychosocial_load is high and ODI is moderate-high, prioritize CBT-informed physiotherapy.
decision_logic.rule_3: If work-related fear (FABQ-W high) and sick leave are present, activate RTW pathway.
decision_logic.rule_4: Re-score risk every 2 weeks during early phase and every 4 weeks thereafter.

do_not_use: Unvalidated home-grown prognostic models for primary care outcomes
Old rigid high MCID-only success thresholds as sole decision criteria

new_candidates_experimental: Paraspinal muscle quality via interpretable ML
